code: import React from"react";import Rating from"@mui/material/Rating";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{faEnvelope,faCircleDot,faUser}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import'./TestimonialCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TestimonialCard(_ref){let{data}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{className:"mb-3",name:"read-only",value:data.rating,precision:0.5,readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:data.review}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"border border-2 p-2 rounded-circle",icon:faUser}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"mb-0 ms-4",children:data.name})]})]});}export default TestimonialCard;
